learning_objectives.description: Transform given relationships to and from straight-line form, including determining unknown constants by calculating the gradient or intercept of the transformed graph. (For example: To straight-line form y = Axⁿ, y = Abˣ. From straight-line form to an equation of the form y² = Ax³ + B, e²ʸ = Ax² + B, y³ = A ln x + B)
